formatExports.description: Whether to format exports as well as imports.

exclude.description: Disable formatting for files matching regular expressions.

excludeGlob.description: Disable formatting for files matching glob patterns.

groupRules.markdownDescription: Grouping rules for path patterns for imports. See the [wiki](https://github.com/daidodo/format-imports/wiki/Grouping-Rules) for more details.

sortRules.markdownDescription: Sorting rules for paths and names. See the [wiki](https://github.com/daidodo/format-imports/wiki/Sorting-Rules) for more details.

wrappingStyle.markdownDescription: When and how to wrap a line. See the [wiki](https://github.com/daidodo/format-imports/wiki/Line-Wrapping-Style) for more details.

keepUnused.markdownDescription: By default all unused imports are removed. Keep some or all them around with this setting if you need.

emptyLinesBetweenGroups.description: Number of empty lines between groups (NOT sub-groups).

removeLastSlashInPath.description: Whether to remove the last slash when normalizing paths.

removeLastIndexInPath.description: Whether to remove the last 'index' when normalizing paths.

emptyLinesAfterAllImports.description: Number of empty lines after the last import statement.

maxLineLength.description: Max line length before wrapping. 0 for no limit.

tabType.description: Indent lines with tabs or spaces.

tabSize.description: Number of spaces to replace a TAB.

trailingComma.description: When to add trailing commas for the last name.

hasSemicolon.description: Whether to add semicolons at the end of statements.

insertFinalNewline.description: Whether to end files with a new line.

bracketSpacing.description: Whether to add spaces between brackets. true for '{ id }' and false for '{id}'.

force.description: Whether to format anyway and disregard exclude/excludeGlob patterns and file-disable comments.

paths.markdownDescription: Sorting rule for import paths. See the [wiki](https://github.com/daidodo/format-imports/wiki/Sorting-Rules) for more details.

names.markdownDescription: Sorting rule for imported/exported names. See the [wiki](https://github.com/daidodo/format-imports/wiki/Sorting-Rules) for more details.

oneOf.description: Type of imports supported by this group.
Types of imports supported by this group.

importType.description: Whether to accept 'import' (true) or 'import type' (false), or both (undefined).

names.description: Import names of matching path to keep

sortImportsBy.description: Sort import statements by paths or first names.

maxBindingNamesPerLine.description: Max binding names per line before wrapping for imports. 0 for no limit.

maxDefaultAndBindingNamesPerLine.description: Max default and binding names per line before wrapping for imports. 0 for no limit.

maxExportNamesPerLine.description: Max binding names per line before wrapping for exports. 0 for no limit.

maxNamesPerWrappedLine.description: Max names on wrapped lines for imports/exports. 0 for no limit.

ignoreComments.description: Whether to ignore trailing comments when counting line length.
